quotation: for `no country for old men,' i had to beef up. for this, i had to be lean. i lost 30 pounds in one month. a 1,200-calorie-a-day diet and 13-mile hike each day. then i went with a couple of guys to indonesia on a surfing trip, which included 14 days in padang at the time of the tsunami and earthquake. we actually felt the earthquake. seems things always happen to me just as i start a movie. i busted my shoulder before we did `old country' and was in an earthquake before `wall street.' my assistant says it's all good luck. after what i've been through slimming down for this, we better end up making good money.
